I always have doubts about those places that are all 5 -star comments, so I came in with a little fries, and hoped to see if this place is all these and a bag of fries.I started from the ruler of all bars, just to see how they measured ... an old -fashioned way.The bartender took it out of the park.In order to see if this was lucky, I drank a glass of Hemingwell's wine next, while my wife was preparing her Mattel.Both of them are excellent.This place is a gem.The bartender really knows what he is doing.He mixed carefully, and its performance and taste are the same.This will be a conventional stay every time you visit Taipei!

I like this place -atmosphere, service, and Loufei music playlist are in place.Their 5 -star rating is not disappointing.If you can only go to one bar in Taipei, it should be this one.

This concept is simple -without menu, you can order a cup of classic cocktails, a cup of customer -made cocktails, or just order any drink in a bar.Their custom cocktail is the best I have ever drank.

This bar changed my view of the Taipei cocktail culture.At first I was disappointed with most cocktail bars in the city, and I almost gave up the idea of â€‹â€‹looking for a good cocktail bar, but I was very surprised by this quality.I know the 5 -star comment looks like a scam. For many other bars in this city, the situation is often the case, but this bar is actually quite legal.

First of all, the bar staff has exquisite skills and knowledgeable knowledge.Skills of technology means that their movements are practiced and intentional; when they stirring drinks, you will not hear any sound. When they shake, they have different shaking technology and wine shakes on different types of beverages.They always taste it before serving, and the dilution of ice is very accurate.These small details are important.In addition, they have a good understanding of alcohol and cocktails, so if you recommend it according to your preferences, they can call you a good and meaningful drink for you.The bartender often has greater ambitions, that is, he hopes to open his own store one day, so he work more diligent than the typical part -time personnel of other bars.People here take bartending as a profession, not just a sideline, but also trying to become better every day.

The owner is also a cool guy.A semi -retired businessman obviously bought too many bottles of high -quality whiskey, but could not find a way to deal with them. He decided to open a bar so he could get rid of the inventory.He is a very generous person who provides me with a few photos of his collection for free, and is a very talkative person.On a quiet night, he just resting with his wife at the bar, so we talked.I want to mention that the bar owner is very strict with his employees; he will order basic drinks, and then ask his employees to ask his knowledge, that is, why you use this whiskey instead of another whiskey as the foundation and teach his employees How to use appropriate wine to prepare the correct drink, and you don't quite understand this.Their understanding of alcohol is impressive, which is not only reflected in their creativity of new drinks, but also in their attention to the details of classic drinks

The overall atmosphere is okay.The quiet and quiet bar, nothing special.I think that if they make the atmosphere darker, the atmosphere will be better, but this is a quiet night night, so I don't know if this is related to this.

Overall, I enjoy my experience.The quality of the beverages here is very high, and it will be recommended to anyone who wants to find a beautiful cocktail
